divs: sighting detailswe were firing fireworks then i (oldest bother) and my sister, little brother, mother looked into the sky we saw a green orb (bright as car headlights in a distance) flying 2x faster then a plane. we looked around the sky and saw multiple airlines flying with blinking lights across the sky, while this event was happening and there was a noticeable difference between to two. this green orb flew across the sky southbound until it was gone. again the green orb flew straight 2x the speed of a plane at airline altitude. we brought out binoculars to get a detailed look, i noticed it was a oval shaped with green in the middle surrounded with a red\orange light. without binoculars it was the size of a pin point. the object wasn't directly over us but was 45 degrees off the horizon. very strange...
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sanders
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Green Orb fly across southwestern sky
